author: imario
msg: create a special output-only converter using the DataProvider for fields configured with the DataProvider and no other special converter to allow a nice human readable output

author: jkuhnert
msg: -) Upgraded to javassist 3.6.ga which is now in the normal maven2 ibiblio repos.
-) Fixed bug in responsebuilders not having a valid instance of PageRenderSupport when interacted with before the render cycle had begun.
-) Added new resize() method to Dialog component so that people can use it to dynamically resize the client side widget when content within the Dialog grows/shrinks.

author: tschneider
msg: Adding around interceptor for backwards compatibility

author: davenewton
msg: https://issues.apache.org/struts/browse/WW-2322 Now putting generated collection into stack context (not pageContext)
